comment: This class was very easy if you put in a little bit of effort. She grades very easily and the assignments aren't hard at all. The quizzes could sometimes be a little difficult, but overall, a very easy class so I definitely recommend taking it!

Professor is knowledgeable about the subject and provides feedback. She does not take late assignments, but takes her time to grade them. She should assign different books to students because it seems as she is tired of reading the same summaries. Also, should change discussion posts questions or provide different ones so students can choo
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework
